items.sentence: How many suicides do you think there are every year in Japan?
I ate half the apple before I noticed there was a worm in it.
Tom doesn\'t think that Mary did all her homework by herself.
Tom got into a fight with Mary\'s brother and broke his nose.
Tom kept talking and didn\'t let Mary get a word in edgewise.
Tom and Mary seem to be attracted to each other, don\'t they?
Let\'s wait and see what happens in the next couple of weeks.
Mary\'s self-conscious about the gap between her front teeth.
Tom didn\'t even seem to realize he\'d hurt Mary\'s feelings.
It didn\'t take Tom long to realize he wasn\'t welcome there.
